Description:
Stunning Vistas and Double the Space
Wake up to stunning views of the magnificent Dandenong Ranges from this outstanding family residence, in walking distance to Luther College and Good Shepherd Primary, commanding space and sunlight with its lofty Cathedral ceilings and magnificent expanse of windows. The flexible family-friendly layout is spread over 2 levels; upstairs is appointed with 2 bathrooms, 3 double sized bedrooms all stylishly renovated with BIRs, Master with WIR and ensuite with luxurious double frameless shower and stone vanity. Description:
Charming & Deceptively Spacious!
Sale by Set Date 10/9/2013
Step up in style and comfort!
Set behind a picket fence and nestled on a large 1034m2 (approx) allotment, the established gardens blend in happy harmony with this character weatherboard home, showcasing French windows and vaulted ceilings, this is one of those rare abodes that make you feel instantly at home.
The split level floor plan delivers a formal fireside lounge (Coonara), separate dining featuring an open fireplace and is serviced by a well equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances; electric oven with gas hotplates, dishwasher, hardwood bench tops, breakfast bar and adjacent meals with polished floorboards.
The separate carpeted rumpus room is of generous size and comprises a Coonara, furthermore, the covered outdoor entertaining area overlooks the tranquil backyard - a fabulous space to host larger parties.
All bedrooms are robed, the master and two other bedrooms share a family bathroom and powder room whilst the two additional bedrooms are zoned separately - ideal for teens - and share a second bathroom.
Adding further comfort and convenience, the home offers gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, slate flooring, skylights, two water tanks (with pump), shed, security alarm, single garage and ample off-street parking.
Situated opposite Griff Hunt Reserve, the location is perfect for the busy family, within close proximity to; Hochkins Ridge Flora Reserve, Croydon North Primary School, Oxley College, Village School, Croydon North Shopping Plaza, Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, Maroondah Adventure Golf and public transport.
This charming residence is generously proportioned, well appointed and will deliver an exceptional lifestyle for the large family.

'Koombahla' is a tranquil family retreat full of character and charm, built in an era when quality was paramount.
Set in a sought-after Croydon North locale, the light filled interior displays garden views from every room.
Discover a flexible layout with four bedrooms, a central bathroom, plus the convenience of a second shower and toilet to make life easy.
One bedroom even has French doors opening out to a private decking.
Relax in the elegance of the formal lounge overlooking the front garden. Flowing through is the huge family room, which opens out to a large decking for seamless indoor/outdoor entertaining.
The gourmet timber kitchen has loads of bench space, corner pantry and the meals area also has an open fire.
Parents and children alike will love the landscaped gardens, complete with fruit trees including Nashi Pear, Apricot, Pink Lady Apple, Pomegranate, Lemon and more. There is also a built in vegie garden and olive grove, plus ample space for children to play. The triple carport provides great off street parking, with room for the boat or caravan. Extras include newly polished hardwood floors, new carpet, ducted heating, and a location that has Warrien Reserve, transport, quality gov't and private schools at your doorstep.

Description:
Serene Views
Sale by Set Date 31/7/2013
Quietly nestled on the corner of The Heath; a spectacular court setting with elevated views of the picturesque Hochkins Ridge Flora Reserve, this warm and welcoming home delivers impressive wall-to-wall spaciousness, inviting light filled living zones and essential services close by, making this desirable home the perfect choice for a busy family.
As soon as you enter through the front door you'll be drawn in by the ample living spaces from the formal lounge relishing a cosy open fireplace and adjoining dining area, through to the open plan family/meals area, there is no shortage of room to recline or entertain.
The kitchen showcases an abundance of cupboard/bench space, large pantry, stainless steel appliances; oven, gas hotplates and dishwasher, soft-close drawers and breakfast bar - modern, well equipped and a joy to work in.
The palm trees and serene views form the perfect setting for entertaining in the private courtyard, featuring a sun deck which conveniently extends onto a paved area, adding an extra living zone during the warmer months.
All four bedrooms are generously sized, starting with the master suite entailing a convenient his & hers walk-in robe and full ensuite comprising a double vanity and large mirror. The additional bedrooms all contain built-in robes and ceiling fans for a cool respite in summer and easy access to the ultra convenient powder room and separate bathroom featuring a large vanity, shower and bath - both bathrooms are stamped with quality boasting popular Villeroy & Boch fittings.
The large laundry is highly functional with cupboards and bench space whilst additional benefits to the home include; gas ducted heating, split system air-conditioning (lounge and master), slate flooring, new carpet, cubby house, security system, remote double garage with storage under the home and access to rear yard for camper/trailer/boat parking.
Presenting lovely curb side appeal, this solid, brick veneer, split level residence is located in a highly sought after estate with great schools nearby; Luther College, Good Shepherd, Yarra Valley Grammar, Yarra Road and Croydon Hills Primary Schools, a selection of shops; McAdam Square, Eastland, Chirnside Park Shopping Centre and a short commute to EastLink, these are just some of the location highlights.
With access to the Hochkins Ridge Flora walk at your doorstep, this friendly and safe community is the ideal environment to raise your family.
